default: Fantastic job today (student)! Keep practicing your English and working hard, you are improving every class! See you next time (student). 亲爱的父母，如果您喜欢今天的课程，请考虑给我一个5分的苹果评估。 这项评估对我的工作非常重要。 非常感谢! From, Teacher Carlos ZDG. TEST 12345
new_student: Fantastic job today (student)! It was great meeting you. Keep up the great work, and I hope to see you in my class again soon. 亲爱的父母，如果您喜欢今天的课程，请考虑给我一个5分的苹果评估。 这项评估对我的工作非常重要。 非常感谢! From, Teacher Carlos ZDG.
